payload.content: Traditional methods of capturing engineering team knowledge (wikis, READMEs, onboarding docs) often become stale quickly because the effort of documentation is deprioritized compared to shipping features.

name: Traditional methods of capturing engineering team knowledge (wikis, READMEs, onb
content: Traditional methods of capturing engineering team knowledge (wikis, READMEs, onboarding docs) often become stale quickly because the effort of documentation is deprioritized compared to shipping features.

payload.content: Stale documentation leads to longer ramp-up times for new engineers, senior engineers repeatedly answering the same questions, and recurring mistakes due to conventions residing only in individuals' minds.

name: Stale documentation leads to longer ramp-up times for new engineers, senior engi
content: Stale documentation leads to longer ramp-up times for new engineers, senior engineers repeatedly answering the same questions, and recurring mistakes due to conventions residing only in individuals' minds.

payload.content: @cognition captures knowledge as a side effect of engineers making corrections, rather than requiring dedicated documentation writing.

name: @cognition captures knowledge as a side effect of engineers making corrections,
content: @cognition captures knowledge as a side effect of engineers making corrections, rather than requiring dedicated documentation writing.

payload.content: When an engineer corrects an AI agent (e.g., @DevinAI) with a specific instruction, the system suggests saving that correction as a knowledge item for future retrieval across the organization.

name: When an engineer corrects an AI agent (e.g., @DevinAI) with a specific instructi
content: When an engineer corrects an AI agent (e.g., @DevinAI) with a specific instruction, the system suggests saving that correction as a knowledge item for future retrieval across the organization.

payload.content: The @cognition system allows knowledge to emerge from natural corrections, eliminating the need for engineers to consciously think about documentation while working.

name: The @cognition system allows knowledge to emerge from natural corrections, elimi
content: The @cognition system allows knowledge to emerge from natural corrections, eliminating the need for engineers to consciously think about documentation while working.

payload.content: Knowledge can be auto-generated by Devin scanning repository contents like READMEs, file structures, and specific configuration files (AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md, .cursorrules, .rules files).

name: Knowledge can be auto-generated by Devin scanning repository contents like READM
content: Knowledge can be auto-generated by Devin scanning repository contents like READMEs, file structures, and specific configuration files (AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md, .cursorrules, .rules files).

payload.content: The system supports updates to existing knowledge items, allowing the knowledge base to evolve with changing conventions.

name: The system supports updates to existing knowledge items, allowing the knowledge
content: The system supports updates to existing knowledge items, allowing the knowledge base to evolve with changing conventions.

payload.content: Knowledge can be manually added directly via the UI or API to codify information upfront.

name: Knowledge can be manually added directly via the UI or API to codify information
content: Knowledge can be manually added directly via the UI or API to codify information upfront.

payload.content: The described system allows team conventions, deployment quirks, internal library preferences, and common pitfalls to accumulate organically from corrections, rather than through explicit documentation efforts.

name: The described system allows team conventions, deployment quirks, internal librar
content: The described system allows team conventions, deployment quirks, internal library preferences, and common pitfalls to accumulate organically from corrections, rather than through explicit documentation efforts.

payload.content: A new engineer using this system can benefit from the accumulated team conventions immediately through the agent, without needing to read documentation or search communication channels.

name: A new engineer using this system can benefit from the accumulated team conventio
content: A new engineer using this system can benefit from the accumulated team conventions immediately through the agent, without needing to read documentation or search communication channels.
